DOC.brief_title: Muscle Metabolic Function Older Adults With Different Vitamin D Status Before After Exercise
DOC.criteria: 6575 year age Currently history cardiovascular pulmonary disease would preclude involvement performance exercise . Uncontrolled diabetes hypertension . History neurological condition relate spinal derangement , disk disease , peripheral neuropathy , tremor rigidity History leg/hip trauma , inflammation , infection rhabdomyolysis , leg surgery past 3 month Have diagnosis osteoporosis ( determined DXA ) Participated resistance aerobic training program last 3 month Engage 1 hr/week vigorous activity Body mass index > 29 On hormone replacement therapy
